page.title: 09SHOPS
page.content: STAUNTON ON WYE SHOP The shop and off licence attached to the PO sells a large range of goods including groceries, green grocery, papers, toys, sweets, patent medicines and NHS baby food. Fresh bread and milk are available daily and the local milkman delivers the newspapers. Meat can be ordered from a local butcher and the shop serves as an outlet for local produce. Regular customers can cash pay cheques there. Opening hours are 7.30 - 6pm with half days Saturday and Sunday. The shop is a friendly place and is a meeting place and a clearing house for news and messages, a vital function in such a scattered area.
